title: Client won't launch (stuck on logo) after 8.21 patch
body:
My client won't launch after installing 8.21 patch, stuck on logo... tried clean reinstall and a bunch of other hacks, all didn't work. Weirdly on my laptop it is fine though...

Please help! I need to reach Gold before Oct.12, thanks Riot!

replies.body: It seems like you might be encountering patching issues. Try the solutions listed in the [**Patching Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434) Riot Support article, and let me know if that resolves the issue. If not, we can continue to troubleshoot your technical issues.

Same here, just as described by the others. Re-installing didn't help and there were no other remaining processes of LoL before the start. However, while showing only the Logo, the process still uses some CPU capacity so it's probably doing something in the background.

This resolved the issue

Note:* this will delete your highlights/replays, so copy this folder to your desktop if wanting to keep them.

-Go to Documents > League of Legends folder
-Delete the entire League of Legends folder, 
-Try launching League again.

Claps for StormGod
The same thing is happening to me. Now that it fails to connect, I have a 5 minute low priority window in which I have to wait to queue. This is so unfair.
Same issue here. After installing the recent patch and upon clicking the LoL icon it displays the logo and just sits there, doesn't load into client interface...

> [{quoted}](name=YouDontWantzRice,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=jhibmW0U,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-25T11:40:35.520+0000)
>
> Same issue here. After installing the recent patch and upon clicking the LoL icon it displays the logo and just sits there, doesn't load into client interface...

Try open task manager (ctrl-alt-delete), and closing any LoL related processes (not just application). Sometimes a LoL process remains active, which prevents the client from opening again.

I have a similar issue and i have attempted to reinstall league all together but once it finishes the intial 1500ish of megabytes the league icon jumps up and down and then it proceeds to disappear and the it says it is not responding.
